title: Cross-Interaction Softness as a Route to Microphase Separation in Binary Colloidal Systems
summary: Understanding how interparticle interactions govern phase behavior is central to controlling self-organization in multicomponent soft-matter systems. In particular, the role of cross-interactions between unlike components remains insufficiently understood.
